title: faux sign painted grocery typeface?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-11-21%20at%2012_3686.15.15%20AM.jpg)

The closest I've got is sans-merci ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/sans-merci/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114657/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/sans-merci/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/smeltery/sans-merci/")) which isn't very close.
